channel.title: 2025-10-14 17:30:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2025-10-14 17:30:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 14 Oct 2025 17:30
item.description:
Two weeks into the shutdown and neither party seems to be in a rush to sort this out. Thankfully we have decent savings. Also does help that the state department has always paid two weeks late. This paycheck should be about 70% my regular paycheck accounting for work done until Sep 30th. There’s talk of this shutdown maybe making it to Thanksgiving. Historically, they’ve responded when ATC / TSA folks threw in their towels…This time around might be different though.

M wants to go to London with S. Thinking we should be able to absorb that cost. And then there’s the Virginia trip. Might be a pricey end of the year!

On the work front, looks like that Malabo trip is gonna happen.

Cameroon had its elections last sunday and Issa Tchiroma unilaterally declared victory today. Something that the Constitutional Council said would be considered ‘High treason’. They made it so far with very little unrest. Next few weeks though portends to be interesting! The worlds’ oldest and longest serving president might not be all so benevolent after all. ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded:
Two weeks into the shutdown and neither party seems to be in a rush to sort this out. Thankfully we have decent savings. Also does help that the state department has always paid two weeks late. This paycheck should be about 70% my regular paycheck accounting for work done until Sep 30th. There’s talk of this shutdown maybe making it to Thanksgiving. Historically, they’ve responded when ATC / TSA folks threw in their towels…This time around might be different though.

M wants to go to London with S. Thinking we should be able to absorb that cost. And then there’s the Virginia trip. Might be a pricey end of the year!

On the work front, looks like that Malabo trip is gonna happen.

Cameroon had its elections last sunday and Issa Tchiroma unilaterally declared victory today. Something that the Constitutional Council said would be considered ‘High treason’. They made it so far with very little unrest. Next few weeks though portends to be interesting! The worlds’ oldest and longest serving president might not be all so benevolent after all. ðŸ”—
